definition[0]: to make a series of long low sounds, especially a long distance away from you
example[0]: We could hear thunder rumbling in the distance.
definition[1]: to move slowly along while making a series of long low sounds
example[1]: We watched the tanks rumbling past the window.
definition[2]: if your stomach rumbles, it makes a noise, especially because you are hungry
definition[3]: to find out what someone is secretly intending to do
definition[5]: a series of long low sounds
example[3]: the low rumble of traffic in the distance
